thread.title: Ciolcan Stefan

author: Ciolcan Stefan
title: Ciolcan Stefan
text:
They are one of the best hosting providers i ever had. Their dedicated servers work very good, they don't have no downtime or hardware problems. I recommend this hosting provider for all of you.
If you are a newbie or you need somebody to talk with you, their support is awesome! Once a ticket is created, they will contact you in 2 hours and will reply in 10 minutes for your ticket.
Great Job serverdiscount!
